ok - a little thinking / working out loud:  os-x snow-leopard:  virtualenv 1.6 installed from zip file by python3 (no "virtualenv3"  link - just in site-packages)
python3 $(which virtualenv)  will run the python3 site-package's  virtualenv....  so far, so good.
(I'll wait for commentary / suggestions on appropriate next steps now...)

The hook loader in virtualenvwrapper only runs under python 2. That doesn't mean you can't use it with python 3, since it doesn't use the version of python inside the virtualenvs you are creating. Set VIRTUALENVWRAPPER_VIRTUALENV to point to the version of virtualenv you want to run, and set VIRTUALENVWRAPPER_PYTHON to point to a version of python 2.
